lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : DUBOIS, CHRIS/EVERETT, JACE/STAPLETON, CHRIS
[00:21.270]Baby lock the door and turn the lights down low
[00:26.500]Put some music on that's soft and slow
[00:31.700]Baby we ain't got no place to go
[00:36.589]I hope you understand
[00:38.309]I have been thinking about this all day long
[00:43.78]Never felt a feeling quite this strong
[00:47.888]I can't believe how much it turns me on
[00:52.279]
[00:52.788]Just be your man
[00:54.849]
[00:59.548]There's no hurry
[01:02.29]Don't you worry
[01:04.459]We can take our time
[01:08.538]

[01:10.889]

[03:01.960]

[03:08.770]Just be your man
tlyric:
[by:conkeree]
[00:21.270]宝贝，锁上门把灯光调暗
[00:26.500]放一些轻柔低缓的音乐
[00:31.700]我们哪儿也不去
[00:36.589]我希望你能明白
[00:38.309]我已经思慕了你整整一天
[00:43.78]从来没有如此强烈的感觉
[00:47.888]我不能相信你让我如此着迷
[00:52.788]只希望做你的男人
[00:59.548]不用急
[01:02.29]不由愁
[01:04.459]我们可以慢慢享受我们在一起的时光
